greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if binary weights of n and 3n have different parity, 0 otherwise; a(n) = A010060(n) XOR A010060(3n).
comment: Thue-Morse sequence A010060(n) xored with its trisection, A293162(n) = A010060(3n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 30 2017
